modifying the fit the above instructions replicate the original socks while they are constructed to fit a wide range of foot circumferences they won t accommodate everyone the following modifications can be used for larger feet note that you can always knit the leg longer if desired and the foot can be knit to an appropriate length for any recipient co 56 sts equivalent to 11 /28cm circumference
